name: UIFontPickerViewController.Configuration
desc: The filters and display settings a font picker view controller uses to set up a font picker.

items.name: var displayUsingSystemFont: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to use the system font for all font names in the font picker.

items.name: var includeFaces: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the font picker should allow the user to select from font faces, or just font families.

items.name: var filteredTraits: UIFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: A predicate to filter fonts based on their traits, like bold, italic, or monospace.

items.name: var filteredLanguagesPredicate: NSPredicate?
items.desc: A predicate to filter fonts based on the languages they support.

items.name: class func filterPredicate(forFilteredLanguages: [String]) -> NSPredicate?
items.desc: Creates a font picker filter based on language support.
